name: Demolition Pig
description:
Solve the puzzles to blow up as many buildings as you can in the time available!

Controls:

  • Click on the wires to rotate them.
  • Once you are connected to the TNT, click the detonator to complete the puzzle.
  • Go as fast as you can, the clock is ticking!

Release Notes:

Version 1.0

  • Released just in time for MiniJam #32
  • May update later with sounds and effects
